傋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gòu］
［《集韻》居候切，去候，見。］
愚昧无知。
[②]［jiǎng］
［《廣韻》古項切，上講，見。］
形容不高雅。

傋字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　傋； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页112第26
【廣韻】【集韻】?古項切，音講。【玉篇】傋?，不媚。　又【集韻】虎項切，音?。【廣韻】儋傋也。　又【集韻】與怐同。【前漢·五行志】不敬而傋，霿之所致也。　又【集韻】居?切，音叩。亦訓無知。【荀子·儒效篇】愚陋傋瞀。俗本荀子譌作溝。

傋字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
傋字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gòu］
["Jiyun" is waiting for cutting, going to wait, see. ]
Ignorance.
[②]［jiǎng］
["Guangyun" Ancient Xiangqie, let's talk about it, see you. ]

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　傋; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 112 26
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Ancient items cut, spoken in sound. [Jade articles] sloppy? Not charming.　[Jiyun] Tiger Xiangqi, sound?. [Guang Yun] Dan Su also.　[Jiyun] and the same. [Previous Han·Five Elements History] Irrespectful and sloppy, it was also caused by Aizhi.　 [Ji Yun] Ju? Cut, sound percussion. Also train ignorance. [Xunzi · Confucianism] Stupid and sloppy. The vulgar version of Xunzi Xiaozhaogou.
